SELECT TOP(1) [r].[CanAccess]
FROM [RolePermissions] AS [r]
WHERE [r].[RoleName] IN (
    SELECT [r0].[value]
    FROM OPENJSON(@__roles_0) WITH ([value] nvarchar(max) '$') AS [r0]
) AND (LEFT(@__normalizedPagePath_1, LEN([r].[PagePath])) = [r].[PagePath] OR LEFT(@__simplifiedPath_2, LEN([r].[PagePath])) = [r].[PagePath])

        SELECT 1
        FROM [RolePermissions] AS [r]
        WHERE [r].[PagePath] = @__normalizedPath_0 AND [r].[RoleName] = N'Admin') THEN CAST(1 AS bit)
    ELSE CAST(0 AS bit)
END

2025-03-27 11:50:12.604 +03:00 [INF] [RolePermission Middleware] Kullanıcı: Guest | Roller: Guest
2025-03-27 11:50:12.779 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (49ms) [Parameters=[@__roles_0='?' (Size = 4000), @__normalizedPagePath_1='?' (Size = 4000), @__simplifiedPath_2='?' (Size = 4000)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT TOP(1) [r].[CanAccess]
FROM [RolePermissions] AS [r]
WHERE [r].[RoleName] IN (
    SELECT [r0].[value]
    FROM OPENJSON(@__roles_0) WITH ([value] nvarchar(max) '$') AS [r0]
) AND (LEFT(@__normalizedPagePath_1, LEN([r].[PagePath])) = [r].[PagePath] OR LEFT(@__simplifiedPath_2, LEN([r].[PagePath])) = [r].[PagePath])

) AND (LEFT(@__normalizedPagePath_1, LEN([r].[PagePath])) = [r].[PagePath] OR LEFT(@__simplifiedPath_2, LEN([r].[PagePath])) = [r].[PagePath])
